docs.snippet: An assertion in a 2003 ruling that there is a “frightening and high” risk of recidivism among sex offenders has been exceptionally influential, despite a lack of evidence.

headline.main: Did the Supreme Court Base a Ruling on a Myth?

docs.snippet: Kwon Pyong, an ethnic Korean who studied in America, was taken into police custody after posting a selfie in which he wore a T-shirt that likened President Xi Jinping to Hitler.

headline.print_headline: He Combined ‘Xi’ With ‘Hitler’ on Twitter. Now He Faces Prison Time.
headline.main: He Called China’s President ‘Xitler’ on Twitter. Now He Faces Prison.
